<ide_opened_file>The user opened the file Untitled-1 in the IDE. This may or may not be related to the current task.</ide_opened_file>
OK. Review the codebase and task list. Identify any incomplete tasks before production deployment and add them to the task list.

Then use ralph ulw to implement all remaining incomplete and deferred tasks.

Success criteria:
- all known issues resolved
- all tasks completed
- all containers running
- all tests passing
